body:
Day 55 - 1326*
The guy must be blind and the girl only sees from one eye. That means that they together have half an eye and separated a quarter of an eye each. But really, why does he need to have his eyes shut?
2/10.
(DONT READ!!) you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga.
